1276780.name: Tidal Shock: Shallows Character Pack
1276780.description:
Suit up with the Shallows Pack, featuring the colorful and playful Crabby Patty, Blue Pincher, Jumpy, and Dart character skins. Whether you’re swimming with the frogs or skittering with the crabs, you’ll be making a splash in the Tidal Shock arena!

Squad up, hunt the depths, and liquidate the competition in high-flying torpedo combat. Tidal Shock is free to play, never pay to win, so your style is all about showing off your unique flair. With vibrant skins that let you dominate the arena in style, you’ll be the one making waves.

Support the Little Guys: Your purchase helps us, a small indie team, keep bringing you more bold, creative experiences!
